attributes.action: Ban the sale of fireworks that make a noise.
attributes.additional_details: The effect of loud and noisy fireworks on animals throughout the country causes anxiety and suffering, not only on bonfire night (4th November) but on many nights prior and after this day. Fireworks regularly come into possession of young people who then set them off repeatedly in built up areas.
attributes.background:
Ban the sale and public use of fireworks that make a noise.

Fireworks that do make a noise should only be used at an organised event.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649354
